Class EnquiryManager

java.lang.Object
EnquiryManager
All Implemented Interfaces:
EnquiryInterface
public class EnquiryManager extends Object implements EnquiryInterface
Manages all enquiry-related operations within the HDB system. Implements the EnquiryInterface to allow Applicants, HDB Officers, and HDB Managers to interact with enquiries.
